chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 is having the issue mentioned above.

Thank you for your help,

Hello,

The customer does not wish to receive the parcel, as the order was placed in error.

Thank you for taking care of the customer's request.

Best regards, 

Linda, Back Market Customer Service

Hello,

I acknowledge receipt of your email and confirm that I have taken note of your request.

I will contact the seller to inform him of your cancellation request, if he still has the possibility of cancelling your order, as it may already be in the process of being shipped, but I will get back to you as soon as I have confirmation.

Best regards,
Linda, Back Market Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the cancellation of the order. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hi ecomobile,

Thank you for your feedback. We look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards
Linda Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare, 

The refund has been made. 

Regards, 
RK
